title: Rota kabhi, kabhi hasata
lyrics:
Rota kabhi, kabhi hasata
Chalata kabhi, kabhi rukhta
Mera Ishwar, Parmeshwar, ha Khuda mera ehua-2
(A)
Takdeer se ham nafrat kyun kare
Ulajhan se, ham kyun ghabraye-2
Aake aasu to mithade,
Aake ulajhan to hatade
Mera Ishwar, Parmeshwar, ha Khuda mera ehua-2
(B)
Kabhi kisiko tu janam diya
Kabhi kisiko tu wapas liya -2
Sabhi to terehi khel hai
Sabhi to tere jalal hai
Mera Ishwar, Parmeshwar, ha Khuda mera yehua-2
